lead_paragraph: Things in April are not always what they seem. The Pirates’ Adam LaRoche, below, has four hits and is batting .105, having struck out 14 times in 38 at-bats. LaRoche had a poor first month last season, hitting .133 and striking out 30 times in 83 at-bats. He still finished 2007 with a .272 average, 21 home runs and 88 runs batted in — all near his career averages.
